channel.title: LooK! some a working dwarf cannon
channel.description:
ive been working on this for acouple of weeks now and so far it fires and hits npcs in the surronding area. my pk cannon (i posted :) ) can fire and hurt people in pits and in wildy so far.
im soon to have it so ony owners can fire and pick up there cannon im soon to have it give exp per a hit
tell me how it looks so far :)

item.title: LooK! some a working dwarf cannon
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

mod p:

yeey, made it myself… it isn’t so hard, i’m trying to add it 100% your’s just attacking all npc’s without even turning around… don’t like that one sorry.

you do know he’s post was from 2 years ago?
